org.threadly.test.concurrent.lock
Class TestableLock

java.lang.Object
  org.threadly.concurrent.lock.VirtualLock
      org.threadly.test.concurrent.lock.TestableLock

public class TestableLock
extends VirtualLock

Lock which is used for a testable scheduler which may not want threads to be blocked.

Constructor Summary
TestableLock(TestablePriorityScheduler scheduler)
          Constructs a new TestableLock with a testable scheduler to default to for implementation.
 
Method Summary
 void await()
          Equivalent to Object.wait() but for injectable VirtualLock implementation.

          Equivalent to Object.wait(long) but for injectable VirtualLock implementation.

          Equivalent to Object.notify() but for injectable VirtualLock implementation.
 void signalAll()
          Equivalent to Object.notifyAll() but for injectable VirtualLock implementation.
 void sleep(long timeInMs)
          Equivalent to Thread.sleep() but for injectable VirtualLock implementation.
